content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Mr. Rahman. I'm sure we can reach an agreement on the rental price that suits both our needs. Would you like to make an offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am a student, and I am looking for a place that is both affordable and comfortable. I would like to offer 1,200 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I understand that you are a student, and I appreciate your budgetary constraints. However, 1,200 Euro per month is below my initial expectations for this apartment. Would you be willing to increase your offer slightly?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand that my initial offer might be below your expectations. As a student, I am trying to find a balance between affordability and comfort. I am willing to increase my offer to 1,300 Euro per month. This is the maximum I can afford at this time.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your willingness to increase your offer. While 1,300 Euro per month is closer to my expectations, I still believe the apartment's market value is slightly higher. Would you be able to go up to 1,350 Euro per month? This would reflect the fair market price for similar apartments in the area.
name: Heinrich Heine
